Reunion event under the slogan "Let's See Each Other Again"
1  January,  2023
In celebration of Best Buddies Month, which falls in March each year, and on the occasion of the 15th anniversary of the establishment of Best Buddies - Qatar, a ceremony was held. The event was attended by members, families, employees, and both old and new official sponsors. They have been and continue to be the driving force behind this initiative, which supports a unified message and vision: social integration of individuals with disabilities and encouragement of friendships for our children with disabilities, thus ending their social isolation.
